SEO_TITLE: Ezequiel's Portfolio - Web and Mobile Developer with 5 Years of Experience
SEO_DESCRIPTION: Hire Ezequiel to build your web or mobile application. Web Developer. Master in creating amazing applications.

EXPERIENCE_ITEMS.TITLE: Ssr Fullstack Developer − Oversoft
EXPERIENCE_ITEMS.DESCRIPTION: Responsible for developing components and designs; in charge of launching the website, as well as maintaining and optimizing it. Also, involved as a developer in data processing and schemaization on the site.

EXPERIENCE_ITEMS.TITLE: React JS Ssr Developer  − Incluit
EXPERIENCE_ITEMS.DESCRIPTION: Responsible for code maintenance, creation of components, hooks, and utilities for the development of a digital judicial processing system for the Texas Supreme Court, United States.

PROJECTS_ITEMS.TITLE: IAnime - Anime series recommendation website based on your preferences, enriched with artificial intelligence.
PROJECTS_ITEMS.DESCRIPTION: Website powered by AI that allows up to 5 choices of your favorite anime, which it uses as a reference to provide you with the best recommendations for new series. Created from scratch with Next.js, React, and Tailwind CSS.

PROJECTS_ITEMS.TITLE: Datalab - Excellent tool for player scouting in Argentina.
PROJECTS_ITEMS.DESCRIPTION: Web application that allows searching for players; enables the comparison of players, accepting a maximum of 5 at a time; making new discoveries in the market; customizing the used database, and many more utilities.

PROJECTS_ITEMS.TITLE: AintFungi - A fashion trend from the future.
PROJECTS_ITEMS.DESCRIPTION: Web application for an e-commerce clothing brand born from the idea of the uniqueness and distinction of each person.

PROJECTS_ITEMS.TITLE: EDM - Elevaplus Data Management.
PROJECTS_ITEMS.DESCRIPTION: Daily and constant use application for managing various aspects of a transportation company. From service loading, employee and client management, to graphics that help visualize daily, monthly, and yearly performance, as well as comparing between different time periods.

ABOUT_ME_P1: My name is Ezequiel, but my family and friends call me Eze. I started programming with a Java pseudocode at around 18 when I began university. Currently, I'm developing all sorts of incredible applications.
ABOUT_ME_P2: Some of my successes include collaborating with the Texas court for the development of the first web application for the management of a fully digital supreme court. Although I'm now distant from that project, it was very exciting to participate and contribute my knowledge and skills.
ABOUT_ME_P3: As a developer, my goal is to improve both personally and professionally by being part of different projects, acquiring new technical and everyday skills. My philosophy is that knowledge has no limits, especially in the world of development, so I'm interested in hearing opinions and getting involved in diverse and varied projects. If you have an innovative project in mind, feel free to contact me.
